content.p: Geospatial Science group engages in research areas behind the technologies used to understand the human and environment systems and processes on Earth. In collaboration with various international and regional multidisciplinary partners, we are focusing in the following sub-themes: The group has been secured research funding as well as supports from MOE, MOSTI, Crops for Future Research Centre (CFFRC), Germany Space Agency (DLR), Faculty of Science, UNMC and Nottingham Geospatial Institute, UK.
